heading: Broken Bulwark Dungeon Guide
content: Broken Bulwark is a fast dungeon featuring the . While the monster families prevent it from being the best dungeon ever, it certainly has excellent clear times. Still, be careful when engaging with large groups of Ghosts who can decimate you quickly! While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
